DAO

Class PostgresGameDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.AbstractDAO<Game>
      • DAO.PostgresGameDAO

  • public class PostgresGameDAO
extends AbstractDAO<Game>
    Data Access Object managing the Game table in the database. Created by mukary on 23/03/2017.
